Summary: GREAT- if the price is right
Text:
when i ordered these 2 bags it was only $18_ today it's $37.....so i paid $9 for a little more than 2 pounds bag with free s/h via amazon prime membership.

it had more plain m&m's than any other candy- but that could have just been my bags- you may find differently- all the bags were sealed and none of the candy was broken or crushed- it is fresh and the expire or 'best if used' by date is JULY 2013- so long shelf life. i also sent a couple of bags to my senior parents who love chocolate.

if you found this helpful- please click on the 'yes' box-- thanx
